Content:
Hi. I've owned a Virago 535 from 1995 for a year. And for half a year since the cold and humidity came outside, I've had problems with misfiring on the first cylinder (the result of the black and wet spark plug). checked the induction coils and put in new ones plus new spark plugs. it worked fine for a month max thensame problem.I'm a very new rider and it's driving me crazy not to be able to use it.
I don't know what else to do.
I am waiting for suggestions.
thank you very much
